title: TheMogMiner: 或在1.9加入新的云渲染
author: a20001017
txt_content:
本帖最后由 cyqsimon 于 2014-9-21 10:56 编辑 

TheAkaryoGaming: You might want to check out the cloud rendering code. It costs me about 20-30fps which is a lot for a bunch of white boxes?
TheMogMiner: The cloud rendering code is fricking atrocious and is #1 on my 1.9 hit-list. Until now there was not much to be done.



TheAkaryoGaming: 你也许得要看看云的渲染代码。我仅仅为了看到这些白盒子就要牺牲掉20-30帧？
TheMogMiner: 云的渲染代码现在是烂得吓人，所以在我的1.9计划表里排在第一位。直到现在进度还不多。
